name: Personalized Evening Wind-Down System with Mood Tracking via Telegram, Notion & Email

user.name: Shelly-Ann Davy
user.bio:
Founder of The Workflow Muse & @SheCodesFlow.

I craft elegant, task-focused automations for creators, founders, and soft-tech enthusiasts.

‚ÄúAutomate with grace. Scale with power.‚Äù

description:
üå∏ **The Quiet Evening Ritual ‚Äî Wind-Down Automation (Telegram + Notion + Email)**

Create a calming **9PM evening** routine that runs itself. This n8n template checks in via Telegram with mood buttons, **delivers personalized support** (meditation when you‚Äôre tired, celebration when you‚Äôre thriving), logs reflections to a Notion ‚ÄúEvening Reflection Log,‚Äù and **sends a gentle goodnight email** with tomorrow‚Äôs affirmation.

**Who it‚Äôs for**

Homemakers, moms, and creators who feel ‚Äúalways on‚Äù and want a graceful, one-tap transition into rest.

**What it does**

**9:00 PM Telegram** mood check (I‚Äôm Tired üí§ / Felt Great ‚ú®)

Personalized content (**5-min meditation or celebration prompt**)

Automatic Notion journaling (mood, reflection, wins, date, affirmation)

Goodnight email with a fresh morning affirmation

**Optional: GPT-4o mini for gentle reflection prompts**

**Why it‚Äôs different**

Not just logging‚Äîthis is a ritualized, emotionally intelligent handoff from work to rest that protects your peace and builds consistency.

**Stack & Nodes**

Cron ‚Üí Telegram ‚Üí IF ‚Üí Notion ‚Üí Email (+ optional GPT)

data.details: The Cron node uses Cron under the hood - a time-based job scheduler in Unix-like computer operating systems. Use this node when you want to trigger workflows periodically, especially in more complex scenarios like "every Tuesday at 9 am" or "Weekdays".

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

template.subTitle: Graceful 9PM wind‚Äëdown: Telegram mood tap ‚Üí Notion log ‚Üí goodnight email
template.description:
## üå∏ The Quiet Evening Ritual ‚Äî Wind‚ÄëDown Automation Flow
**SEO Title:** The Quiet Evening Ritual ‚Äî Wind‚ÄëDown Automation (Telegram + Notion + Email)  
**Meta Description:** A graceful 9PM wind‚Äëdown routine for moms & creators: Telegram mood check, personalized content, Notion journal log, and a goodnight email with tomorrow‚Äôs affirmation.

### What it does
- 9:00 PM daily ping on Telegram: *‚Äúüåô Time to wind down, sweet soul. How was your day?‚Äù*
- User taps a mood button ‚Üí *Tired* or *Great*
- If **Tired** ‚Üí sends a 5‚Äëmin meditation link + (optional) AI reflection prompt
- If **Great** ‚Üí celebrates the win + logs to Notion
- Logs the entry to **Notion: Evening Reflection Log**
- Sends a **Goodnight email** with tomorrow‚Äôs morning affirmation ‚ú®

### Why it‚Äôs fresh
Not just journaling‚Äîthis is a *ritualized transition* from work to rest, with warmth and automation.

## üîß Setup Checklist (n8n Template Requirements)
- Create credentials (no hardcoded keys):
  - **Telegram** Bot (BotFather) ‚Üí add to a private chat with you
  - **Notion** (integration + database access)
  - **Email** (Gmail OAuth or SMTP)
- Make a Notion database named **Evening Reflection Log** with properties:
  - **Name** (Title), **Mood** (Select), **Reflection** (Text), **Top Win** (Text), **Date** (Date), **Affirmation** (Text)
- Import the provided CSV to auto‚Äëcreate properties if needed.
- Edit the **Set: User Config** node (email, db id, links, toggles).
- Optional: Enable the GPT node by flipping `gpt_enabled` to `true` and attaching OpenAI credentials.

## ‚úÖ n8n Submission Compliance
- Uses **Sticky Notes** with H2 markdown ‚úÖ
- **No API keys** hardcoded in nodes ‚úÖ
- Clear setup steps + credentials ‚úÖ
- Descriptive, on‚Äëbrand copy with emojis ‚úÖ
- Real, practical use case for wellness ‚úÖ

workflow.name: The Quiet Evening Ritual ‚Äî Wind‚ÄëDown Automation
